Orion.Distance: 17.51 ly, 5.37 pc (nearest star in the constellation) to 1,359 ly [farthest of the 7 main stars in the constellation, Alnilam (Epsilon Orionis, _ Orionis)]
Orion.Notes: Orion, "The Hunter" (from Greek mythology). Betelgeuse (_ Ori), Orion Nebula(M42) (example of a edge-on proplyd & face-on proplyd), Horsehead Nebula.
captions: Orion in the 9th century Leiden Aratea
